contentrichtext.text: {{nihongo|'''Kumamoto University'''|熊本大学|Kumamoto Daigaku}} is a university located in [[Kumamoto]], [[Japan]]. It was established on May 31, 1949, at which time the following institutions were subsumed into it; Kumamoto [[Teacher]]s College (established in 1874), Kumamoto [[Pharmaceutical]] College (1885), The Fifth [[High School]] (1887), Kumamoto [[Medical College]] (1896), and Kumamoto [[Technical College]] (1906). [[Image:Kumamoto university headquarters building 1.jpg|thumb|right]] ==External links== *[http://www.kumamoto-u.ac.jp/ Kumamoto University website] {{coord|32|48|50|N|130|43|41|E|type:edu_source:kolossus-frwiki|display=title}} [[Category:Japanese national universities]] [[Category:Kumamoto, Kumamoto]] [[Category:Universities and colleges in Kumamoto Prefecture]] {{kumamoto-university-stub}}
